程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.Talker.ChatGPT

类 ChatGPTCompletions

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.Talker.ChatGPT.ChatGPTCompletions
所有已实现的接口:
Talkative
public class ChatGPTCompletions extends Object implements Talkative
This class represents the OpenAI GPT-3 API using the "completions" endpoint. It implements the Talkative interface, which means it can be used for chatbots or conversation agents that can chat with users. The class has several fields that represent the various parameters that can be used when sending a request to the API. The ask() method sends a request to the API and returns the response, which is the completed text generated by the API based on the given prompt and parameters. The class also has a chat() method that can be used to chat with the API using a default API key specified in the Config class. This method simply calls the ask() method with the given text and the default API key. Note that this class assumes the use of the "completions" endpoint and sets the endpoint URL accordingly. If a different endpoint is to be used, a separate class should be created for that endpoint.
版本:
1.0
作者:
ltseed

    best_of
    The "best_of" parameter of the generation process, which controls how many completions to return

    The "frequency_penalty" parameter of the generation process, which controls the avoidance of using similar phrases

    Whether or not to use a proxy when making requests to the API

    A map of logit biases to apply to the generation process

    logprobs
    Whether or not to include log probabilities in the response from the API

    The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completed text

    The "n" parameter of the generation process, which controls the number of completions to generate

    presence_penalty
    The "presence_penalty" parameter of the generation process, which controls the avoidance of repeating the same text

    suffix
    A suffix to add to the prompt before sending it to the API
    private final double
    temperature
    The "temperature" of the generation process, which controls the randomness of the generated text

    The "top_p" parameter of the generation process, which controls the diversity of the generated text

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ChatGPTCompletions

      protected ChatGPTCompletions(String model, String suffix, int max_tokens, double temperature, int top_p, int n, Integer logprobs, double presence_penalty, double frequency_penalty, int best_of, Map<String,String> logit_bias)
      Constructor for ChatGPTCompletions. Takes in various parameters that can be used to send a request to the API.
      参数:
      model - the model to use for generating text
      suffix - the suffix to add to the prompt before generating text
      max_tokens - the maximum number of tokens to generate
      temperature - the temperature to use when generating text
      top_p - the top_p to use when generating text
      n - the number of completions to generate
      logprobs - whether to include log probabilities when generating text
      presence_penalty - the presence penalty to use when generating text
      frequency_penalty - the frequency penalty to use when generating text
      best_of - the number of best completions to return
      logit_bias - the logit bias to use when generating text

  • 方法详细资料

    • ask

      public String ask(String prompt, String key)
      Sends a request to the OpenAI GPT-3 API using the "completions" endpoint with the given prompt and API key. Returns the completed text generated by the API based on the prompt and parameters set in this object.
      参数:
      prompt - the prompt to be sent to the API
      key - the API key to be used for authentication
      返回:
      the completed text generated by the API

    • chat

      public String chat(String string)
      Sends a request to the OpenAI GPT-3 API using the "completions" endpoint with the given text and the default API key specified in the Config class. Returns the completed text generated by the API based on the prompt and parameters set in this object.
      指定者:
      chat 在接口中 Talkative
      参数:
      string - the text to be sent to the API
      返回:
      the completed text generated by the API
